column5: Looking for a good spot to get away with the boys May 31 weekend. Want to fish and some other ammenities wouldnt hurt for our non fishing buddy. Needs to sleep 5-6...and somewhere not too buggy would be great!!
Not to buggy on May 31st is a tall order. I'd try Martin Camp in Restoule. North Bay is close(Fannies) plus great fishing and hiking in the area
Not to many bugs at the end of may!      .  http://www.bythebay.on.ca/      Check it out.
Totem Point Lodge French River.  Cheap, friendly, good fishing!
and what general area are you thinking of?  or, where is your start point and how far do you wish to drive, MAXIMUM?  Doug
Your leaving this to open..  Need some details.  My May boys weekend is camping on crown land..  I assume your looking for a lodge?  or rental cottage?
Three castles resort.  Buckhorn ON, great folks!

Shloim,  Budget, that's probably the most important thing you didn't mention. You may have a beer budget and someone recommends a good Champagne. The other thing is what is your definition of amenity? I think luxury at a fishing camp is an indoor toilet, my wife's definition is it's a necessity. Shower, now that's a luxury, she begs to differ.  I always tell everyone asking me a question that I have problem getting, you have to remember the W5 formula. Who? What? When? Where? And why? Now ask the W5 and that's a good question. How included and you get the best answers.  Let us know the above and you will get some great recommendations here. Total of thousands of years experience at your disposal.
Mike can help you out.   CanadaFishingGuide.net
